content: Got unstructured grids and need analysis tools that understand them? Now is your chance to weigh in the development roadmap for Project Raijin's unstructured grid data operators. Check out the discussion here.

Hi there,

Has anyone successfully been able to use conservative methods to regrid to a lat/lon regional MPAS?
No, we haven't yet. Project Raijin will work remapping but it will not likely be very soon.
